ComicInfo.Summary:
Trekked by the New Crusaders, Baba Yaga and Avril seek the help of an evil witch named Liza. Will their plan work or will trusting a sinister witch prove a deadly mistake?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daniel Leister & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Brescini & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Abhishek Malsuni | 4 | Note: The digital edition (8/19/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
